text: Bonding (short for "Bandwidth ON Demand INteroperability Group") protocol is a generic name for a method of bonding or aggregation of multiple physical links to form a single logical link. Bonding is the term often used in Linux implementations: on Windows based systems the term teaming is often used, and between network-devices we talk about link aggregation, LAG and Link Aggregation Control Protocol. == Major categories == * Asynchronous bonding protocol * Synchronous bonding protocol ==See also== * Channel bonding * Inverse multiplexer * Link aggregation ==References== ==External links== * *
title: Bonding protocol
